title: 비즈니스 담화 표현
description: in line with, in light of, at stake 등의 비즈니스/공식 표현을 활용합니다. BUSINESS-DISCOURSE-EXPRESSIONS 패턴을 연습합니다.
examples: Our results are in line with expectations.
In light of recent events, we have changed our policy.
Many jobs are at stake if the deal falls through.
learning_points: 전문적이고 격식 있는 비즈니스 표현의 적절한 활용

sentences.en: Our results are in line with expectations.
In light of recent events, we have changed our policy.

sentences.kr: 거래가 무산되면 많은 일자리가 위험에 처합니다.
sentences.en: Many jobs are at stake if the deal falls through.

sentences.kr: 현재 상황을 고려하여 전략을 재평가해야 합니다.
sentences.en: In view of the current situation, we need to reassess our strategy.

sentences.kr: 회사의 평판이 이 결정에 달려 있습니다.
sentences.en: The company's reputation is at stake with this decision.

sentences.kr: 우리의 접근 방식은 업계 표준에 부합합니다.
sentences.en: Our approach is in line with industry standards.
In light of new regulations, we have updated our procedures.

sentences.kr: 프로젝트의 성공이 우리 미래에 달려 있습니다.
sentences.en: The success of this project is at stake for our future.
